subject: Re: Categories and Parameterized Tests
msgSnippet: Hi thanx for the confirmation. No I didn t file it at junit.org. I couldn t find the correct place to do that ... although I admit I didn t try very hard. Jens
messageBody:
Hi
thanx for the confirmation.

No I didn't file it at junit.org.
I couldn't find the correct place to do that ... although I admit I didn't try very hard.

Jens

> > So I guess my points/ questions are:
> > - The behavior of a TestSuite should not depend on the order of contained Tests
> > - If a Runner isn't supported by a Suite Runner, this should result in an instructive error message
